'''Triangular Mechanisms''' are mechanisms found in [[Enkanomiya]]. Within a certain distance, attacks can be used to activate them. These mechanisms will reset after a while. Intact mechanism can be used during [[Whitenight]], and broken mechanisms can be used during [[Evernight]].
